error.message: Class Yoti\Http\CurlRequestHandler extends deprecated class Yoti\Http\AbstractRequestHandler: 3.0.0 Replaced by \Yoti\Http\RequestHandlerInterface
Call to deprecated method extractPemContent() of class Yoti\YotiClient: 3.0.0 this will be replaced by \Yoti\Util\PemFile.
Call to deprecated method getLoginUrl() of class Drupal\yoti\YotiHelper: use `yoti.sdk` service instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to yoti.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
